solution_line_template: Archie needs ${antibiotic_cost_per_pill} x {times_per_day} = $<<{antibiotic_cost_per_pill}*{times_per_day}={cost_per_day}>>{cost_per_day} per day to buy {times_per_day} antibiotics.
Therefore Archie needs ${cost_per_day} x {days_in_week} = $<<{cost_per_day}*{days_in_week}={total_cost}>>{total_cost} to buy antibiotics that will last for a week.
